title: Home | Sargento Foods
text: Welcome to Sargento Foods Family Owned Sargento Foods has been a leader in cheese since 1953. We are proud to be the company that successfully introduced America to pre-packaged sliced and shredded natural cheese. Today, we manufacture and market amazing natural cheese products, as well as ingredients. Our third-generation family owners live to serve our communities and employees, who are part of the Sargento Family. Louie Gentine and Mike McEvoy, Sargento third-generation family owners Our Roots The Sargento Family includes everyone who contributes to the success of our company: our employees, customers, vendors and neighbors. It’s what we call our Stakeholder Philosophy and part of our founder, Leonard Gentine’s belief, of how we “treat people like family.” Our Brand Since 1953, we've made sure every slice, shred, and snack lives up to our family name. You have our word on it. You have our name on it. Your Passion. Our Culture. How We Work At Sargento, you work for a company you believe in with a family of people who believe in you. If you're ready for a place to belong and grow your career, you’ll find it here. Our Stats Continuing to Grow Forward $1.7B Net Sales2500+ Employees70+ Years Private, Family-Owned5 LocationsEqual Opportunity Employer . M/F/D/V. Drug Free Workplace. | Sargento Foods is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer . Sargento Foods participates in the E-Verify Program. E-Verify Notice ( English | Spanish ).
